author: Dick Bradsell
description: A short variation on the classic Julep: lightly sweetened bourbon and mint.
name: Julep Martini
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
